languages.text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
languages.original_text: Половина {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} от {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g} сохраняется на союзнике до конца боя. Этот бонус не суммируется сам с собой и с другими бонусами от {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g}, но считается эффектом от {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} при расчете эффектов других {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}. Примечание: считается, что на союзника не наложен эффект от {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g}. Он просто получает соответствующие бонусы к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Half of the bonus granted by the Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but counts as an effect of the Leader's ability for all other talents.

Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

Он просто получает соответствующие бонусы к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}.

This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Этот бонус не суммируется сам с собой и с другими бонусами от {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g}, но считается эффектом от {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} при расчете эффектов других {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}. Примечание: считается, что на союзника не наложен эффект от {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g}. Он просто получает соответствующие бонусы к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}带来的一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}不会消失，会始终保持到战斗结束为止。此加值无法与自身或{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}赋予的加值叠加，但在其他{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}效果的计算过程中，会被视为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的效果。 注：受影响的目标只获得{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}带来的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}加值，不视为受“指挥之声”效果影响。
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}带来的一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}不会消失，会始终保持到战斗结束为止。此加值无法与自身或{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}赋予的加值叠加，但在其他{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}效果的计算过程中，会被视为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的效果。 注：受影响的目标只获得{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}带来的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}加值，不视为受“指挥之声”效果影响。

languages.text: La mitad de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} otorgadas por {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} permanecen en vigor hasta el final del combate. Esta bonificación no se acumula consigo misma ni con otras bonificaciones conferidas por {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, pero sí cuenta como efecto de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} en lo que respecta a los efectos de otros {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}. Nota: El objetivo de Impresión duradera no cuenta como bajo los efectos de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, sino que solo recibe bonificaciones a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La mitad de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} otorgadas por {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} permanecen en vigor hasta el final del combate. Esta bonificación no se acumula consigo misma ni con otras bonificaciones conferidas por {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, pero sí cuenta como efecto de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} en lo que respecta a los efectos de otros {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}. Nota: El objetivo de Impresión duradera no cuenta como bajo los efectos de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, sino que solo recibe bonificaciones a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.

La mitad de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} otorgadas por Voz de mando permanecen en vigor hasta el final del combate. Esta bonificación no se acumula consigo misma ni con otras bonificaciones conferidas por Voz de mando, pero sí cuenta como efecto de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} en lo que respecta a los efectos de otros {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}. Nota: El objetivo de Impresión duradera no cuenta como bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, sino que solo recibe bonificaciones a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.

languages.text: Die Hälfte des durch {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} gewährten {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} bleibt bis zum Ende des Kampfes bestehen. Dieser Bonus ist nicht mit sich selbst oder durch {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} gewährte Boni stapelbar, gilt hinsichtlich der Effekte anderer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} aber als {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeitseffekt{/g}. Hinweis: Der betroffene Verbündete wird hinsichtlich des Effektes {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} nicht gewertet. Er erhält lediglich Boni auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Hälfte des durch {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} gewährten {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} bleibt bis zum Ende des Kampfes bestehen. Dieser Bonus ist nicht mit sich selbst oder durch {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} gewährte Boni stapelbar, gilt hinsichtlich der Effekte anderer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} aber als {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeitseffekt{/g}. Hinweis: Der betroffene Verbündete wird hinsichtlich des Effektes {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} nicht gewertet. Er erhält lediglich Boni auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.

languages.text: La moitié du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conféré par {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} perdure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable avec lui-même ni avec les bonus octroyés par {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g}, mais il compte comme un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} pour les besoins des autres effets de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}. Remarque : l'allié cible n'est pas considéré comme bénéficiaire de l'effet de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} et obtient uniquement les bonus à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La moitié du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conféré par {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} perdure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable avec lui-même ni avec les bonus octroyés par {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g}, mais il compte comme un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} pour les besoins des autres effets de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}. Remarque : l'allié cible n'est pas considéré comme bénéficiaire de l'effet de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} et obtient uniquement les bonus à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}.

La moitié du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conféré par Voix du commandement perdure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable avec lui-même ni avec les bonus octroyés par Voix du commandement, mais il compte comme un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} pour les besoins des autres effets de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}. Remarque : la cible d'Impression durable n'est pas considérée comme bénéficiaire de l'effet de Voix du commandement et obtient uniquement les bonus à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指揮の声{/g} によって与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の半分は、戦闘終了まで持続する。このボーナスは、自分で得られる他の{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指揮の声ボーナスや同様の効果とは累積しないが、他の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}効果においては{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}として扱われる。 メモ：対象の味方は{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指揮の声{/g} の効果を持つと見なされず、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対するボーナスのみを得る。
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 指揮の声によって与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の半分は、戦闘終了まで持続する。このボーナスは、自分で得られる他の指揮の声ボーナスや同様の効果とは累積しないが、他の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}効果においては{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}として扱われる。 メモ：持続する感銘の対象は指揮の声の効果を持つと見なされず、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対するボーナスのみを得る。

languages.text: {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} kabiliyetinin sağladığı {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusun{/g} yarısı, çatışma sonuna dek kalır. Bu bonus, kendisiyle veya {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} sağladığı bonuslarla üst üste birikmez ancak diğer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerilerin{/g} etkileri hesaplanırken {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g} kabiliyeti etkisi olarak sayılır. Not: Etkilenen dost birim, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} etkisine maruz kalmış sayılmaz. Yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} bonus kazanır.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: the affected ally does not count as having the {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} kabiliyetinin sağladığı {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusun{/g} yarısı, çatışma sonuna dek kalır. Bu bonus, kendisiyle veya {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} sağladığı bonuslarla üst üste birikmez ancak diğer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerilerin{/g} etkileri hesaplanırken {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g} kabiliyeti etkisi olarak sayılır. Not: Kalıcı Tesir'in hedefi, Emir Sözü etkisine maruz kalmış kabul edilmez. Yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} bonus kazanır.

{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} kabiliyetinin sağladığı {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusun{/g} yarısı, çatışma sonuna dek kalır. Bu bonus, kendisiyle veya {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} sağladığı bonuslarla üst üste birikmez ancak diğer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerilerin{/g} etkileri hesaplanırken {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g} kabiliyeti etkisi olarak sayılır. Not: Etkilenen dost birim, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} etkisine maruz kalmış sayılmaz. Yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} bonus kazanır.

languages.text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
